<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TraceGVPlacement controls messages for all builds. For builds with assertions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (debug or release), messages are also controlled by the usual debug flags</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (e.g. -debug and -debug-only=globallayout)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63" lineLink="#a3e9dc98d250ba1568f2625eabb92f7f5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define TRACE&#95;TO(s, X) s &lt;&lt; X</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifdef NDEBUG</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define TRACE(X)                                                               \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">  do &#123;                                                                         \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">    if (TraceGVPlacement) &#123;                                                    \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">      TRACE&#95;TO(errs(), X);                                                     \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">    &#125;                                                                          \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">  &#125; while (false)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72" lineLink="#a638b671f4fa00cd5267c8df6c19c4477"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define TRACE(X)                                                               \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">  do &#123;                                                                         \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">    if (TraceGVPlacement) &#123;                                                    \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">      TRACE&#95;TO(errs(), X);                                                     \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">    &#125; else &#123;                                                                   \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">      LLVM&#95;DEBUG(TRACE&#95;TO(dbgs(), X));                                         \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">    &#125;                                                                          \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">  &#125; while (false)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Returns true if the section name is such that the symbol will be put</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in a small data section.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For instance, global variables with section attributes such as &quot;.sdata&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &quot;.sdata.&#42;&quot;, &quot;.sbss&quot;, and &quot;.sbss.&#42;&quot; will go into small data.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86" lineLink="#adfc4891114114529b51c8386e89110dc"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#adfc4891114114529b51c8386e89110dc">isSmallDataSection</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Sec) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sectionName is either &quot;.sdata&quot; or &quot;.sbss&quot;. Looking for an exact match</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// obviates the need for checks for section names such as &quot;.sdatafoo&quot;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Sec == </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.sdata&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> || Sec == </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.sbss&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> || Sec == </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.scommon&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If either &quot;.sdata.&quot; or &quot;.sbss.&quot; is a substring of the section name</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// then put the symbol in small data.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Sec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a83a294111af6d4412163b209725ca556">contains</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.sdata.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) || Sec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a83a294111af6d4412163b209725ca556">contains</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.sbss.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
